message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $11,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're working within a budget, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $9,500? I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to be careful with my finances.
